title: Simulation-Based Instructional Design for Developing AI Literacy Formative Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and completion of secondary-level mathematics education
context.additional_context: Enhanced mathematical problem-solving activities using VR simulations in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more fundamental principles of AI technology and their educational applications
Learners can diagnose their AI literacy across four dimensions (affective/behavioral/cognitive/ethical) using a survey-based self-assessment tool
Learners can apply AI-based math problem-solving strategies in a VR simulation environment and write a self-reflection report

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
